Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Remainder of Fiscal Year
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in remainder of current fiscal year.

LongTermDebtNoncurrent.label: Long-term Debt, Excluding Current Maturities
LongTermDebtNoncurrent.description: Amount after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs of long-term debt classified as noncurrent and excluding amounts to be repaid within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

LongTermNotesPayable.label: Notes Payable, Noncurrent
LongTermNotesPayable.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of notes payable (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer), excluding current portion.

MaintenanceRevenue.label: Maintenance Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
MaintenanceRevenue.description: Revenue derived from maintenance services provided under contracts or arrangements with clients. For example, it may include the maintenance of software, plant and equipment, and facilities.

ManagementFeesRevenue.label: Management Fees Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
ManagementFeesRevenue.description: Revenue, comprised of base and incentive revenue derived from the management of joint ventures, managing third-party properties, or another entity's operations.

MarketableSecurities.label: Marketable Securities
MarketableSecurities.description: Amount of investment in marketable security.

MarketingAndAdvertisingExpense.label: Marketing and Advertising Expense
MarketingAndAdvertisingExpense.description: The total expense recognized in the period for promotion, public relations, and brand or product advertising.

MinorityInterest.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
MinorityInterest.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which is directly or indirectly attributable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (that is, noncontrolling interest, previously referred to as minority interest).

MinorityInterestOwnershipPercentageByPar.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Ownership Percentage by Parent
MinorityInterestOwnershipPercentageByPar.description: The parent entity's interest in net assets of the subsidiary, expressed as a percentage.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities, including discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities, Continuing Operations
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of financing activities, excluding discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from investing activities, including discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities, Continuing Operations
NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of investing activities, excluding discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, including discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities, Continuing Operations
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, excluding discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetIncomeLoss.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
NetIncomeLoss.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

NetIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollin.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
NetIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollin.description: Amount of Net Income (Loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.label: Net Income (Loss) Available to Common Stockholders, Basic
NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities; of income (loss) available to common shareholders.

NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionDebtAssum.label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Debt Assumed
NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionDebtAssum.description: "The amount of debt that an Entity assumes in acquiring a business or in consideration for an asset received in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionInvestmen.label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Investments Acquired
NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionInvestmen.description: "The amount of investments that an Entity acquires in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as information about all investing and financing activities of an enterprise during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

NoncontrollingInterestDecreaseFromDecons.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Decrease from Deconsolidation
NoncontrollingInterestDecreaseFromDecons.description: The amount of the reduction or elimination during the period of a noncontrolling interest resulting from the parent's loss of control and deconsolidation of the entity in which one or more outside parties had a noncontrolling interest.

NonoperatingIncomeExpense.label: Nonoperating Income (Expense)
NonoperatingIncomeExpense.description: The aggregate amount of income or expense from ancillary business-related activities (that is to say, excluding major activities considered part of the normal operations of the business).

NotesAndLoansPayable.label: Notes and Loans Payable
NotesAndLoansPayable.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of all notes and loans payable (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer).

NotesAndLoansReceivableNetCurrent.label: Financing Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
NotesAndLoansReceivableNetCurrent.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable, classified as current. Includes, but is not limited to, notes and loan receivable.

NotesAndLoansReceivableNetNoncurrent.label: Financing Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
NotesAndLoansReceivableNetNoncurrent.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable, classified as noncurrent.

NotesAssumed1.label: Notes Assumed
NotesAssumed1.description: The fair value of notes assumed in noncash investing or financing activities.

NotesIssued1.label: Notes Issued
NotesIssued1.description: The fair value of notes issued in noncash investing and financing activities.

NotesPayable.label: Notes Payable
NotesPayable.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, aggregate carrying amount of all types of notes payable, as of the balance sheet date, with initial maturities beyond one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

NotesPayableCurrent.label: Notes Payable, Current
NotesPayableCurrent.description: Sum of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of the portions of long-term notes payable due within one year or the operating cycle if longer.

NotesPayableRelatedPartiesClassifiedCurr.label: Notes Payable, Related Parties, Current
NotesPayableRelatedPartiesClassifiedCurr.description: The amount for notes payable (written promise to pay), due to related parties. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

NotesPayableRelatedPartiesCurrentAndNonc.label: Notes Payable, Related Parties
NotesPayableRelatedPartiesCurrentAndNonc.description: The amount for notes payable (written promise to pay), due to related parties.

NotesPayableRelatedPartiesNoncurrent.label: Notes Payable, Related Parties, Noncurrent
NotesPayableRelatedPartiesNoncurrent.description: The amount for notes payable (written promise to pay), payable to related parties, which are due after one year (or one business cycle).

NumberOfOperatingSegments.label: Number of Operating Segments
NumberOfOperatingSegments.description: Number of operating segments. An operating segment is a component of an enterprise: (a) that engages in business activities from which it may earn revenues and incur expenses (including revenues and expenses relating to transactions with other components of the same enterprise), (b) whose operating results are regularly reviewed by the enterprise's chief operating decision maker to make decisions about resources to be allocated to the segment and assess its performance, and (c) for which discrete financial information is available. An operating segment may engage in business activities for which it has yet to earn revenues, for example, start-up operations may be operating segments before earning revenues.

NumberOfReportableSegments.label: Number of Reportable Segments
NumberOfReportableSegments.description: Number of segments reported by the entity. A reportable segment is a component of an entity for which there is an accounting requirement to report separate financial information on that component in the entity's financial statements.

OperatingExpenses.label: Operating Expenses
OperatingExpenses.description: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Includes selling, general and administrative expense.

OperatingIncomeLoss.label: Operating Income (Loss)
OperatingIncomeLoss.description: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.

OperatingLeaseCost.label: Operating Lease, Cost
OperatingLeaseCost.description: Amount of single lease cost, calculated by allocation of remaining cost of lease over remaining lease term. Includes, but is not limited to, single lease cost, after impairment of right-of-use asset, calculated by amortization of remaining right-of-use asset and accretion of lease liability.

OperatingLeaseExpense.label: Operating Lease, Expense
OperatingLeaseExpense.description: Amount of operating lease expense. Excludes sublease income.

OperatingLeaseLiability.label: Operating Lease, Liability
OperatingLeaseLiability.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease.

OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent.label: Operating Lease, Liability, Current
OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease, classified as current.

OperatingLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent.label: Operating Lease, Liability, Noncurrent
OperatingLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease, classified as noncurrent.

OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset.label: Operating Lease, Right-of-Use Asset
OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset.description: Amount of lessee's right to use underlying asset under operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable letter-terms in excess of one year.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueC.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due, Next Twelve Months
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueC.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Three Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Two Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future minimum rental payments in aggregate as of the balance sheet date under operating leases.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, Current
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future rental payments receivable within one year of the balance sheet date under an operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, in Two Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future rental payments receivable within the second year from the balance sheet date under an operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRema.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Remainder of Fiscal Year
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRema.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the remainder of the fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OtherAssetsCurrent.label: Other Assets, Current
OtherAssetsCurrent.description: Amount of current assets classified as other.

OtherAssetsNoncurrent.label: Other Assets, Noncurrent
OtherAssetsNoncurrent.description: Amount of noncurrent assets classified as other.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Gain (Loss), before Adjustment, after Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.description: Amount, after tax and before adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Gain (Loss), after Adjustment and Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.description: Amount, after tax and adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurre.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Adjustment, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurre.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurre.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI, Realized upon Sale or Liquidation, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurre.description: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for translation gain (loss) realized upon the sale or liquidation of an investment in a foreign entity and foreign currency hedges that are designated and qualified as hedging instruments for hedges of the foreign currency exposure of a net investment in a foreign operation.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Sale of Securities, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized gain (loss) realized upon the sale of available-for-sale securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTax.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) allocated to other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss), before Adjustment, after Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.description: Amount, after tax and before adjustment, of unrealized holding gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale). Excludes unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherDepreciationAndAmortization.label: Other Depreciation and Amortization
OtherDepreciationAndAmortization.description: Amount of expense charged against earnings to allocate the cost of tangible and intangible assets over their remaining economic lives, classified as other.

OtherExpenses.label: Other Expenses
OtherExpenses.description: Amount of expense classified as other.

OtherLongTermInvestments.label: Other Long-term Investments
OtherLongTermInvestments.description: Amount of long-term investments classified as other.

OtherNoncashIncomeExpense.label: Other Noncash Income (Expense)
OtherNoncashIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) included in net income that results in no cash inflow (outflow), classified as other.

OtherNonoperatingExpense.label: Other Nonoperating Expense
OtherNonoperatingExpense.description: Amount of expense related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.label: Other Nonoperating Income (Expense)
OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

OtherOperatingActivitiesCashFlowStatemen.label: Other Operating Activities, Cash Flow Statement
OtherOperatingActivitiesCashFlowStatemen.description: Other cash or noncash adjustments to reconcile net income to cash provided by (used in) operating activities that are not separately disclosed in the statement of cash flows (for example, cash received or cash paid during the current period for miscellaneous operating activities, net change during the reporting period in other assets or other liabilities).

OtherOperatingIncomeExpenseNet.label: Other Operating Income (Expense), Net
OtherOperatingIncomeExpenseNet.description: The net amount of other operating income and expenses, the components of which are not separately disclosed on the income statement, from items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operations.

OtherPaymentsToAcquireBusinesses.label: Other Payments to Acquire Businesses
OtherPaymentsToAcquireBusinesses.description: The cash outflow associated with other payments to acquire businesses including deposit on pending acquisitions and preacquisition costs.

OtherSellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpe.label: Other Selling, General and Administrative Expense
OtherSellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpe.description: Amount of selling, general and administrative expense classified as other.

PaymentsForProceedsFromAvailableforsaleS.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Available-for-sale Securities, Short-term
PaymentsForProceedsFromAvailableforsaleS.description: Amount of cash outflow (inflow) through acquisition (sale) of short-term available-for-sale securities.

PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherInvestingAct.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Other Investing Activities
PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherInvestingAct.description: Amount of cash (inflow) outflow from investing activities classified as other.

PaymentsForProceedsFromRealEstateHeldfor.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Real Estate Held-for-investment
PaymentsForProceedsFromRealEstateHeldfor.description: The net amount paid or received by the reporting entity associated with the purchase (sale) of real estate held for investment, as opposed to operating, purposes.

PaymentsForPurchaseOfOtherAssets.label: Payments for Purchase of Other Assets (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
PaymentsForPurchaseOfOtherAssets.description: Cash paid to purchase assets other than those represented by other elements (securities, loans, mortgages, real estate).

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.label: Payments for Repurchase of Common Stock
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.description: The cash outflow to reacquire common stock during the period.

PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.label: Payments to Acquire Available-for-sale Securities
PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.description: The cash outflow to acquire debt and equity securities not classified as either held-to-maturity securities or trading securities which would be classified as available-for-sale securities and reported at fair value, with unrealized gains and losses excluded from earnings and reported in a separate component of shareholders' equity.

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesGross.label: Payments to Acquire Businesses, Gross
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesGross.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of business during the period. The cash portion only of the acquisition price.

PaymentsToAcquireFinanceReceivables.label: Payments to Acquire Finance Receivables
PaymentsToAcquireFinanceReceivables.description: The cash outflow for the purchase of amounts due from customers, clients, lessees, borrowers, or others under the terms of its agreements therewith.

PaymentsToAcquireHeldForSaleRealEstate.label: Payments to Acquire Held-for-sale Real Estate
PaymentsToAcquireHeldForSaleRealEstate.description: The cash outflow from the acquisition of a piece of land held for sale, anything permanently fixed to it, including buildings, structures on it, and so forth.

PaymentsToAcquireIntangibleAssets.label: Payments to Acquire Intangible Assets
PaymentsToAcquireIntangibleAssets.description: The cash outflow to acquire asset without physical form usually arising from contractual or other legal rights, excluding goodwill.

PaymentsToAcquireMarketableSecurities.label: Payments to Acquire Marketable Securities
PaymentsToAcquireMarketableSecurities.description: Amount of cash outflow for purchase of marketable security.

PaymentsToAcquireNotesReceivable.label: Payments to Acquire Notes Receivable
PaymentsToAcquireNotesReceivable.description: The cash outflow to acquire an agreement for an unconditional promise by the maker to pay the entity (holder) a definite sum of money at a future date. Such amount may include accrued interest receivable in accordance with the terms of the note. The note also may contain provisions including a discount or premium, payable on demand, secured, or unsecured, interest bearing or noninterest bearing, among myriad other features and characteristics.

PaymentsToAcquireOtherInvestments.label: Payments to Acquire Other Investments
PaymentsToAcquireOtherInvestments.description: Amount of cash outflow to acquire investments classified as other.

PaymentsToAcquireProductiveAssets.label: Payments to Acquire Productive Assets
PaymentsToAcquireProductiveAssets.description: The cash outflow for purchases of and capital improvements on property, plant and equipment (capital expenditures), software, and other intangible assets.

PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.label: Payments to Acquire Property, Plant, and Equipment
PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale; includes cash outflows to pay for construction of self-constructed assets.

PaymentsToAcquireRealEstateHeldForInvest.label: Payments to Acquire Real Estate Held-for-investment
PaymentsToAcquireRealEstateHeldForInvest.description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of real estate held for investment purposes.

PaymentsToDevelopRealEstateAssets.label: Payments to Develop Real Estate Assets
PaymentsToDevelopRealEstateAssets.description: Payments to develop real estate assets is the process of adding improvements on or to a parcel of land. Such improvements may include drainage, utilities, subdividing, access, buildings, and any combination of these elements; and are generally classified as cash flow from investing activities.

PreferredStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.label: Preferred Stock, Par or Stated Value Per Share
PreferredStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.description: Face amount or stated value per share of preferred stock nonredeemable or redeemable solely at the option of the issuer.

PreferredStockSharesAuthorized.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Authorized
PreferredStockSharesAuthorized.description: The maximum number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws.

PreferredStockSharesIssued.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Issued
PreferredStockSharesIssued.description: Total number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) issued to shareholders (includes related preferred shares that were issued, repurchased, and remain in the treasury). May be all or portion of the number of preferred shares authorized. Excludes preferred shares that are classified as debt.

PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Outstanding
PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.description: Aggregate share number for all nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by stockholders. Does not include preferred shares that have been repurchased.

PreferredStockValue.label: Preferred Stock, Value, Issued
PreferredStockValue.description: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable preferred shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.

PrepaidExpenseCurrent.label: Prepaid Expense, Current
PrepaidExpenseCurrent.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

PriorPeriodReclassificationAdjustment.label: Prior Period Reclassification Adjustment
PriorPeriodReclassificationAdjustment.description: The amount of a reclassification adjustment made to prior period financial statement amounts.

ProceedsFromDivestitureOfBusinessesAndIn.label: Proceeds from Divestiture of Businesses and Interests in Affiliates
ProceedsFromDivestitureOfBusinessesAndIn.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from the sale of a business segment or subsidiary or sale of an entity that is related to it but not strictly controlled during the period (for example, an unconsolidated subsidiary, affiliate, joint venture or equity method investment).

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.description: The cash inflow from the additional capital contribution to the entity.

ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.label: Proceeds from Maturities, Prepayments and Calls of Held-to-maturity Securities
ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.description: The cash inflow associated with the maturity, prepayments and calls (requests for early payments) of debt securities designated as held-to-maturity.

ProceedsFromNotesPayable.label: Proceeds from Notes Payable
ProceedsFromNotesPayable.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

ProceedsFromRelatedPartyDebt.label: Proceeds from Related Party Debt
ProceedsFromRelatedPartyDebt.description: The cash inflow from a long-term borrowing made from related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Proceeds from Advances from Affiliates.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Related Party Debt
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from long-term debt by a related party. Related parties, include, but are not limited to, affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, and pension trusts.

ProceedsFromRepurchaseOfEquity.label: Proceeds from (Repurchase of) Equity
ProceedsFromRepurchaseOfEquity.description: The net cash inflow or outflow resulting from the entity's share transaction.

ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfHeldToMatur.label: Proceeds from Sale and Maturity of Held-to-maturity Securities
ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfHeldToMatur.description: Amount of cash inflow from the sale or maturity of long-term held-to-maturity securities.

ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfMarketableS.label: Proceeds from Sale and Maturity of Marketable Securities
ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfMarketableS.description: The cash inflow associated with the aggregate amount received by the entity through sale or maturity of marketable securities (held-to-maturity or available-for-sale) during the period.

ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.label: Proceeds from Sale of Available-for-sale Securities
ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of debt and equity securities classified as available-for-sale securities.

ProceedsFromSaleOfHeldToMaturitySecuriti.label: Proceeds from Sale of Held-to-maturity Securities
ProceedsFromSaleOfHeldToMaturitySecuriti.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of securities that had been designated as held-to-maturity. Excludes proceeds from maturities, prepayments and calls by the issuer.

ProceedsFromSaleOfNotesReceivable.label: Proceeds from Sale of Notes Receivable
ProceedsFromSaleOfNotesReceivable.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherAssets1.label: Proceeds from Sale of Other Assets
ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherAssets1.description: Amount of cash inflow from the sale of other assets as part of operating activities.

ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherProductiveAssets.label: Proceeds from Sale of Other Productive Assets
ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherProductiveAssets.description: Amount of cash inflow from the sale of tangible or intangible assets used to produce goods or deliver services, classified as other.

ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyPlantAndEquipm.label: Proceeds from Sale of Property, Plant, and Equipment
ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyPlantAndEquipm.description: The cash inflow from the sale of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale.

ProceedsFromSaleOfRealEstateHeldforinves.label: Proceeds from Sale of Real Estate Held-for-investment
ProceedsFromSaleOfRealEstateHeldforinves.description: Cash received from the sale of real estate that is held for investment, that is, it is part of an investing activity during the period.

ProfessionalFees.label: Professional Fees
ProfessionalFees.description: A fee charged for services from professionals such as doctors, lawyers and accountants. The term is often expanded to include other professions, for example, pharmacists charging to maintain a medicinal profile of a client or customer.

ProfitLoss.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ProfitLoss.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Gross
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Net
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.description: Amount after accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOther.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Other, Gross
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOther.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of other physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOwnedAccumulate.label: Property, Plant, and Equipment, Owned, Accumulated Depreciation
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOwnedAccumulate.description: The cumulative amount of depreciation (related to long-lived, depreciable flight assets owned by the entity and used in the entity's principle business operations and capitalized assets classified as property, plant and equipment that are owned by the entity) that has been recognized in the income statement.

ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts.label: Accounts Receivable, Credit Loss Expense (Reversal)
ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts.description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on accounts receivable.

RealEstateAccumulatedDepreciation.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Accumulated Depreciation
RealEstateAccumulatedDepreciation.description: Amount of accumulated depreciation pertaining to real estate investments for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCarr.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Building and Improvements, Amount
RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCarr.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation of buildings and improvements for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate. Excludes real estate not held as an investment or interest.

RealEstateHeldForDevelopmentAndSaleSubsi.label: Real Estate Held for Development and Sale, Subsidiary
RealEstateHeldForDevelopmentAndSaleSubsi.description: For banks, amount of real estate assets held for development or resale by subsidiary entities which hold such assets in the course of business.

RealEstateHeldforsale.label: Real Estate Held-for-sale
RealEstateHeldforsale.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of investments in land and buildings held for sale, excluding real estate considered to be inventory of the entity.

RealEstateImprovements.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Improvements
RealEstateImprovements.description: Amount of increase in real estate investments related to improvements for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateInvestmentPropertyNet.label: Real Estate Investment Property, Net
RealEstateInvestmentPropertyNet.description: Amount of real estate investment property, net of accumulated depreciation, which may include the following: (1) land available-for-sale; (2) land available-for-development; (3) investments in building and building improvements; (4) tenant allowances; (5) developments in-process; (6) rental properties; and (7) other real estate investments.

RealEstateInvestments.label: Real Estate Investments, Net
RealEstateInvestments.description: Amount of real estate investments, net of accumulated depreciation, which may include the following: (1) land available-for-sale; (2) land available-for-development; (3) investments in building and building improvements; (4) tenant allowances; (5) developments in-process; (6) rental properties; (7) other real estate investments; (8) real estate joint ventures; and (9) unconsolidated real estate and other joint ventures not separately presented.

RealEstateInvestmentsOther.label: Real Estate Investments, Other
RealEstateInvestmentsOther.description: Amount of real estate owned for income production and capital accretion potential, not otherwise specified in the existing taxonomy. Such real estate excludes that which is occupied or used in the business, for entertainment purposes, or held in inventory for specific purposes.

RealEstatePeriodIncreaseDecrease.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Period Increase (Decrease)
RealEstatePeriodIncreaseDecrease.description: Amount of increase (decrease) before accumulated depreciation of real estate investments for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateRevenueNet.label: Real Estate Revenue, Net (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
RealEstateRevenueNet.description: The aggregate revenue from real estate operations during the reporting period.

RelatedPartyTaxExpenseDueToAffiliatesCur.label: Related Party Tax Expense, Due to Affiliates, Current
RelatedPartyTaxExpenseDueToAffiliatesCur.description: The amount of any current tax-related balances due to affiliates as of the date of each statement of financial position presented.

RentalIncomeNonoperating.label: Rental Income, Nonoperating
RentalIncomeNonoperating.description: Income earned by providing the use of assets to an outside party in exchange for a payment or series of payments that is nonoperating in nature.

RepaymentsOfDebt.label: Repayments of Debt
RepaymentsOfDebt.description: The cash outflow during the period from the repayment of aggregate short-term and long-term debt. Excludes payment of capital lease obligations.

RepaymentsOfNotesPayable.label: Repayments of Notes Payable
RepaymentsOfNotesPayable.description: The cash outflow for a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

RepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.label: Repayments of Related Party Debt
RepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.description: The cash outflow for the payment of a long-term borrowing made from a related party where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Payments for Advances from Affiliates.

RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

RevenueFromContractWithCustomerIncluding.label: Revenue from Contract with Customer, Including Assessed Tax
RevenueFromContractWithCustomerIncluding.description: Amount, including tax collected from customer, of revenue from satisfaction of performance obligation by transferring promised good or service to customer. Tax collected from customer is tax assessed by governmental authority that is both imposed on and concurrent with specific revenue-producing transaction, including, but not limited to, sales, use, value-added and excise.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

SalariesWagesAndOfficersCompensation.label: Salary and Wage, Excluding Cost of Good and Service Sold
SalariesWagesAndOfficersCompensation.description: Amount of expense for salary and wage arising from service rendered by nonofficer and officer employees. Excludes allocated cost, labor-related nonsalary expense, and direct and overhead labor cost included in cost of good and service sold.

SalesOfRealEstate.label: Sales of Real Estate (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
SalesOfRealEstate.description: Revenue from the sale of commercial, industrial, or residential property during the period. This element is more likely than not relevant to an entity for which real estate operations are a principal activity. If real estate operations are not a principal activity, the reporting entity would likely use a gain (loss) on sale of property, plant, or equipment type element.

SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.label: Selling, General and Administrative Expense
SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.description: The aggregate total costs related to selling a firm's product and services, as well as all other general and administrative expenses. Direct selling expenses (for example, credit, warranty, and advertising) are expenses that can be directly linked to the sale of specific products. Indirect selling expenses are expenses that cannot be directly linked to the sale of specific products, for example telephone expenses, Internet, and postal charges. General and administrative expenses include salaries of non-sales personnel, rent, utilities, communication, etc.

ShareBasedCompensation.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Noncash Expense
ShareBasedCompensation.description: Amount of noncash expense for share-based payment arrangement.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Non-Option Equity Instruments, Forfeitures and Expirations
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of shares under non-option equity instrument agreements that were either cancelled or expired.

SharesIssuedPricePerShare.label: Shares Issued, Price Per Share
SharesIssuedPricePerShare.description: Per share or per unit amount of equity securities issued.

ShortTermInvestments.label: Short-term Investments
ShortTermInvestments.description: Amount of investments including trading securities, available-for-sale securities, held-to-maturity securities, and short-term investments classified as other and current.

StockholdersEquity.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent
StockholdersEquity.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.label: Stockholders' Equity, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.description: Amount of stockholders' equity (deficit), net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity, attributable to both the parent and noncontrolling interests. Amount excludes temporary equity. Alternate caption for the concept is permanent equity.

StockholdersEquityNoteStockSplitConversi.label: Stockholders' Equity Note, Stock Split, Conversion Ratio
StockholdersEquityNoteStockSplitConversi.description: Ratio applied to the conversion of stock split, for example but not limited to, one share converted to two or two shares converted to one.

StockholdersEquityNoteSubscriptionsRecei.label: Stockholders' Equity Note, Subscriptions Receivable
StockholdersEquityNoteSubscriptionsRecei.description: Note received instead of cash as contribution to equity. The transaction may be a sale of capital stock or a contribution to paid-in capital.

StockIssued1.label: Stock Issued
StockIssued1.description: The fair value of stock issued in noncash financing activities.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesTreasurySto.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Treasury Stock Reissued
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesTreasurySto.description: Number of treasury shares or units reissued. Excludes reissuance of shares or units in treasury for award under share-based payment arrangement.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.description: Equity impact of the value of new stock issued during the period. Includes shares issued in an initial public offering or a secondary public offering.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueTreasuryStoc.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Treasury Stock Reissued
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueTreasuryStoc.description: Value of treasury shares or units reissued. Excludes reissuance of shares or units in treasury for award under share-based payment arrangement.

StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodShares.label: Stock Repurchased During Period, Shares
StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodShares.description: Number of shares that have been repurchased during the period and have not been retired and are not held in treasury. Some state laws may govern the circumstances under which an entity may acquire its own stock and prescribe the accounting treatment therefore. This element is used when state law does not recognize treasury stock.

StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.label: Stock Repurchased During Period, Value
StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased during the period and has not been retired and is not held in treasury. Some state laws may mandate the circumstances under which an entity may acquire its own stock and prescribe the accounting treatment therefore. This element is used when state law does not recognize treasury stock.

SubleaseIncome.label: Sublease Income
SubleaseIncome.description: Amount of sublease income excluding finance and operating lease expense.

TaxAdjustmentsSettlementsAndUnusualProvi.label: Tax Adjustments, Settlements, and Unusual Provisions
TaxAdjustmentsSettlementsAndUnusualProvi.description: Amount of increase (decrease) to previously recorded tax expense. Includes, but is not limited to, significant settlements of income tax disputes, and unusual tax positions or infrequent actions taken by the entity, including tax assessment reversal, and IRS tax settlement.

TaxesPayableCurrent.label: Taxes Payable, Current
TaxesPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for statutory income, sales, use, payroll, excise, real, property and other taxes. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

TechnologyServicesCosts.label: Technology Services Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
TechnologyServicesCosts.description: Costs incurred in providing technology services. The services may include training, installation, engineering or consulting. Consulting services often include implementation support, software design or development, or the customization or modification of the licensed software.

TechnologyServicesRevenue.label: Technology Services Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
TechnologyServicesRevenue.description: Revenue from providing technology services. The services may include training, installation, engineering or consulting. Consulting services often include implementation support, software design or development, or the customization or modification of the licensed software.

TemporaryEquityForeignCurrencyTranslatio.label: Temporary Equity, Foreign Currency Translation Adjustments
TemporaryEquityForeignCurrencyTranslatio.description: Adjustments to temporary equity resulting from foreign currency translation adjustments.

TransferOfLoansHeldForSaleToPortfolioLoa.label: Transfer of Loans Held-for-sale to Portfolio Loans
TransferOfLoansHeldForSaleToPortfolioLoa.description: Value of loans held-for-sale transferred to loans held in the entity's portfolio in noncash transactions.

TransferToInvestments.label: Transfer to Investments
TransferToInvestments.description: Value of investments transferred to the entity's investments in noncash transactions.

TravelAndEntertainmentExpense.label: Travel and Entertainment Expense
TravelAndEntertainmentExpense.description: Expenses incurred for travel and entertainment during the period.

TreasuryStockNumberOfSharesHeld.label: Treasury Stock, Number of Shares Held (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
TreasuryStockNumberOfSharesHeld.description: Number of shares held for each class of treasury stock.

TreasuryStockShares.label: Treasury Stock, Shares
TreasuryStockShares.description: Number of common and preferred shares that were previously issued and that were repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury on the financial statement date. This stock has no voting rights and receives no dividends.

TreasuryStockSharesRetired.label: Treasury Stock, Shares, Retired
TreasuryStockSharesRetired.description: Number of shares of common and preferred stock retired from treasury during the period.

TreasuryStockValue.label: Treasury Stock, Value
TreasuryStockValue.description: The amount allocated to treasury stock. Treasury stock is common and preferred shares of an entity that were issued, repurchased by the entity, and are held in its treasury.

TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.label: Treasury Stock, Value, Acquired, Cost Method
TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.description: Equity impact of the cost of common and preferred stock that were repurchased during the period. Recorded using the cost method.

UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Investments
UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

ValuationAllowanceAmount.label: Valuation Allowance, Amount (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
ValuationAllowanceAmount.description: The amount of the valuation allowance recorded as of the balance sheet date pertaining to the specified deferred tax asset for which an assessment was made that it is more likely than not that all or a portion of such deferred tax asset will not be realized through related deductions on future tax returns.

ValuationAllowancesAndReservesBalance.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Amount
ValuationAllowancesAndReservesBalance.description: Amount of valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves.

ValuationAllowancesAndReservesPeriodIncr.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Period Increase (Decrease)
ValuationAllowancesAndReservesPeriodIncr.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves.

WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.label: Weighted Average Number Diluted Shares Outstanding Adjustment
WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.description: The sum of dilutive potential common shares or units used in the calculation of the diluted per-share or per-unit computation.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic and Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.description: Average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating basic and diluted earnings per share (EPS).

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateContinuingOperatio.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateContinuingOperatio.description: Percentage of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationChan.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Change in Deferred Tax Assets Valuation Allowance, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationChan.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to changes in the valuation allowance for deferred tax assets.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationDedu.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Deduction, Dividend, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationDedu.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to deduction for dividend.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationStat.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, State and Local Income Taxes, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationStat.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations applicable to state and local income tax expense (benefit), net of federal tax expense (benefit).

FinanceLeaseInterestExpense.label: Finance Lease, Interest Expense
FinanceLeaseInterestExpense.description: Amount of interest expense on finance lease liability.

ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsExcludingGoo.label: Impairment of Intangible Assets (Excluding Goodwill)
ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsExcludingGoo.description: The amount of impairment loss recognized in the period resulting from the write-down of the carrying amount of an intangible asset (excluding goodwill) to fair value.

OperatingLossCarryforwards.label: Operating Loss Carryforwards
OperatingLossCarryforwards.description: Amount of operating loss carryforward, before tax effects, available to reduce future taxable income under enacted tax laws.

GainLossOnSaleOfProperties.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Properties
GainLossOnSaleOfProperties.description: The difference between the carrying value and the sale price of real estate or properties that were intended to be sold or held for capital appreciation or rental income. This element refers to the gain (loss) included in earnings and not to the cash proceeds of the sale. This element is a noncash adjustment to net income when calculating net cash generated by operating activities using the indirect method.
